content: LoginGet started#1 AI Rendering ToolBring architectural concepts to life instantly.Visualizee turns your sketches, images, 3D models or text prompts into realistic renders.Without the need to spend time and money on expensive 3D softwares.Start rendering3 free renders. No credit card required.Watch demo12 minTrusted by 2100+ architects and designers"I spent years in the 3D space and this is an excellent and practical use of the technology. Nice job."- David LaubnerHow it worksUpload your conceptFirst you need to upload your concept. It can be an image - we accept JPGs and PNGs, or it can be a 3D model - we accept FBXs, OBJs and GLTFs.If you just want to get inspired just skip this point.Setup render parametersNext step is to setup render parameters. Look for magic wand, should be just above your concept. If there is not, click on your concept.After clicking magic wand the render window should appear and should be already connected to your concept with black line.Enter your prompt, optionally tell what you want to exclude, set other parameters and click Generate. a modern house with deep color design and warm woodEnjoy your renderUsually after couple of seconds your render should appear next to your render window. If you are not happy with the results you can generate another image or use inpainting feature to fix parts of this image."Visualizee.ai is a game-changer for architects and designers. You're revolutionizing the architectural world one concept at a time! üëèüíØ"- Prema ToppoStart renderingPricingBring your visions to life. Now.$9Start for Free3 free renders. No credit card required.Up to 200 rendersUnlimited files1 image generation at a timeCommercial license14 days$19Start for Free3 free renders. No credit card required.Up to 600 rendersUnlimited filesImages up to 2K4 image generation at a timeInpaintingCommercial license30 days$29Start for Free3 free renders. No credit card required.Up to 2000 rendersUnlimited filesImages up to 4K4 image generation at a timeInpaintingWorking with 3D modelsCommercial license90 daysTrusted by 2100+ architects and designersNeed more? Up to 16K images, custom AI reference models, white label?Contact us"The tool is incredibly easy to use. Simply upload your design and choose a pre-made style or create your own. Visualizee.ai will then generate a render in seconds. I'm so glad I found Visualizee.ai. It's an essential tool for any architect or designer."- Farjana AFrequently asked questionsWe've compiled a list of the most common questions we get asked. If you have any other questions, please feel free to reach out to us."A few years back something like this would have been a technological marvel. Now it is literally available to all the architects to be able to convert their sketches and drawings into realistic looking images!"- Rohan PathakCreate realistic visualizations of your concepts in seconds, not hours.Save your money and time and present your ideas to your clients without hustle. Iterate fast until you find perfect results and make your clients happy. Create unlimited renders, modify them, work directly on 3D models and let AI do the magic for you.Join our DiscordImagine.
